DOC.brief_summary: The Strength study aim evaluate use RenalGuard device protect patient high risk develop acute kidney injury follow complex cardiovascular intervention require high volume contrast .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Use RenalGuard Protect Patients High Risk AKI
DOC.detailed_description: The Strength Trial randomize , international ( France Germany ) multicentre ( 7 ) trial . The patient population target suffer kidney insufficiency ( estimate Glomerular Filtration Rate ( eGFR ) 15 40 ml/min/m2 ) need go complex cardiovascular intervention.. This population patient high risk develop AKI follow contrast medium administration complex cardiovascular intervention require high amount contrast . Standard treatment hydration risk hyper hypohydration population patient . RenalGuard insure replacement urine output infusion match volume sterile replacement solution maintain patient ' intravascular fluid volume . The patient randomize protected contrast-induced nephropathy use RenalGuard standard hydration treatment followed-up 12 month .
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year old 15 ml/min/m2 ≤ eGFR ≤ 40 ml/min/m2 High volume contrastrequiring cardiovascular procedure ( estimate contrast volume > 3 time eGFR value ) Patient agree FU test Administration iodine contrast medium within 5 day index procedure Emergency procedure primary PCI Patients pulmonary edema cardiogenic shock ( Killip 3 4 ) Hypoxemia define SaO2 ≤ 90 % and/or PaO2 ≤ 80 mmHg room air Acute Kidney Injury require dialysis procedure Multiple myeloma cancer treat chemotherapy Subjet anuric Subject hospitalize change renal function undergone renal replacement therapy ( hemodialysis hemofiltration ) within past month Known hypersensitivity furosemide active ingredient excipient Renal insufficiency oligoanuria resistant furosemide cause nephrotoxic hepatotoxic substance Precoma coma induce hepatic encephalopathy Severe hypokalemia , sever hyponatremia , hypovolemia without hypotension dehydration Hypersensitivity sulfamides Enrollment another study unless study registry unless primary endpoint reach Expected life expectancy < 1 year Pregnant breastfeeding patient Patient trusteeship guardianship Patient unable / unwilling provide inform consent
